input.content: Decide if following data fullfills the following criteria: ["solved", "unsloved"]. Return a JSON object with the following fields: 'status' (select one oflables according to the criteria)

[{"role": "user", "content": "I'm frustrated because my home internet keeps dropping every few minutes on Wi-Fi, and resetting the router doesn't fix it."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "I'm sorry you're dealing with this. I can help. I'll run a quick diagnostic on your line; please confirm the account email on file and whether the issue occurs on Wi-Fi only or also via Ethernet."}, {"role": "user", "content": "It's on Wi-Fi only, and the drops affect multiple devices; the router lights blink when it happens."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Resolution: External line fault detected; a technician appointment is scheduled for tomorrow; estimated resolution within 24\u201348 hours."}]
Decide if following data fullfills the following criteria: ["solved", "unsloved"]. Return a JSON object with the following fields: 'status' (select one oflables according to the criteria)

[{"role": "user", "content": "I'm frustrated\u2014the app won't sign me in; I get \"invalid credentials\" even after resetting my password."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "I understand. Let's verify your account and reset if needed. Please provide the email on file and the last four digits of the phone number on the account for verification."}, {"role": "user", "content": "The email is example@domain.com, last 4 digits are 1234; after reset I still can't sign in; the app says \"account locked.\""}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Resolution: Your account has been unlocked and a new temporary password has been issued. Sign in with the temporary password and set a new one in the app. If you still can't sign in, reinstall the app and try again."}]
Decide if following data fullfills the following criteria: ["solved", "unsloved"]. Return a JSON object with the following fields: 'status' (select one oflables according to the criteria)

[{"role": "user", "content": "This is ridiculous\u2014the printer won't connect to Wi-Fi; the LED is blinking yellow, and I've followed the manual with no success."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "I\u2019m sorry about that. Let\u2019s fix it. Is the printer within 3 meters of the router and on the 2.4 GHz network? What\u2019s the model number?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Model is HP DeskJet 2700; it\u2019s offline in the app though the laptop can see the network; it\u2019s on 2.4 GHz."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Resolution: Firmware updated and the printer re-added to your network; it\u2019s now online and printing. Please test and confirm it\u2019s stable."}]
Decide if following data fullfills the following criteria: ["solved", "unsloved"]. Return a JSON object with the following fields: 'status' (select one oflables according to the criteria)

[{"role": "user", "content": "Frustrated Customer: I ordered a wireless headset two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking shows 'in transit' with no updates, and I need it for a conference next week."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Customer Service Representative: I'm really sorry for the delay. I'll look up your order, confirm the shipping status, and see if we can expedite or offer a replacement if it's missing."}]

[{"role": "user", "content": "Frustrated Customer: Please check now. My order number is ORD-123456. If it can't be delivered by Friday, I want a full refund."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Customer Service Representative: I checked ORD-123456 and it's delayed due to carrier issues. Resolution status: Refund of $129.99 has been issued to your original payment method; you should see the refund in 3-5 business days."}]

[{"role": "user", "content": "Satisfied Customer: I'm having trouble with my wireless headphones\u2014they randomly disconnect from my laptop after about a minute, causing audio to drop."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Technical Support Agent: Thanks for the details. Let's try these steps: 1) forget the device and re-pair, 2) update the Bluetooth driver to the latest version, 3) disable Bluetooth power saving in Device Manager, 4) run the Windows Audio Troubleshooter."}]
Decide if following data fullfills the following criteria: ["solved", "unsloved"]. Return a JSON object with the following fields: 'status' (select one oflables according to the criteria)

[{"role": "user", "content": "Satisfied Customer: I re-paired the device, updated the driver, and turned off Bluetooth power saving, but the disconnects still happen during playback. It works fine with my phone. Could this be a laptop hardware issue or a warranty problem?"}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "Technical Support Agent: Resolution status: Resolved. The issue was a faulty Bluetooth module; we replaced the module under warranty and the headphones now stay connected with stable audio."}]

[{"role": "user", "content": "I bought a wireless headset last week, and the battery won't last more than an hour on a full charge."}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "I'm sorry about that. Please share your order number and the exact model so I can arrange a replacement or refund."}]
